speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an overdue balance on your account. Can I please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. Can you also confirm your current address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming that. You currently have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it now and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. So, would you like to make a payment of $225 today?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I will do that online.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll guide you through the process. Thank you for your cooperation.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Sarah. Have a great day!
